video_prompt: Fleets of spacecraft maneuver, firing vibrant energy beams. Explosions ripple across the scene, engulfing dark, spiky ships and illuminating sleek, white vessels. Central mothership pulsates with internal blue light. Swirling galaxies and shifting nebulae form a dynamic cosmic backdrop.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Epic, large-scale space battle, intricate central mothership glowing blue, surrounded by numerous warring spacecraft. Sleek white ships with blue energy beams clash against dark, spiky, organic-looking ships with red glow. Dynamic explosions, crisscrossing energy fire. Background features prominent spiral galaxies and colorful nebulae. High detail, dramatic lighting.
refined_video_prompt: Spacecraft fleets rapidly maneuver, vibrant energy beams lancing across the void. Explosions erupt and propagate, consuming dark, spiky vessels while momentarily silhouetting sleek, white ships. The central mothership actively pulses with an internal blue luminescence. Galaxies swirl and nebulae shift, constantly reconfiguring the cosmic background.
